snippet.title: Fuu3's Fuun Journey Definitive Edition Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
What happens when you mix classic platformers, cubes, and a little humor? You get Fuu3, the star of Fuu3's Fuun Journey! Make your way across multiple different locations, like beaches and forests! Use your trusty hat to take down enemies in a flash! Your journey isn’t without purpose, however. You must do whatever it takes to destroy the twisted Minus3 and his ragtag group of mercenaries. They will stop at nothing to see you at your weakest. Put your skills to the test and be who you were always destined to be in FUU3’S FUUN JOURNEY DEFINITIVE EDITION, coming to gamejolt and sfghq in September 2024!

Join our discord server!
https://discord.gg/XFyzSYHgnN

Play the current demo!
https://gamejolt.com/games/Fuu3/563119
https://sonicfangameshq.com/forums/showcase/fuu3s-fuun-journey-festive-edition.1974/
